text:
Bava#ntyaqmumEqva tairlOqkamaqBi ja#yantiq yat pra#tIqcInA#ni pRuqShThAniq Bava#ntIqmamEqva tairlOqkamaqBi ja#yanti trayastriq(gm)qSau ma#ddhyaqtaH stOmau# BavataqH sAmrA$jyamEqva ga#cCantyadhirAqjau Ba#vatO&dhirAqjA Eqva sa#mAqnAnA$M BavantyatirAqtrAvaqBitO# BavataqH pari#gRuhItyai || 10
(pRuqShThAniq - catu#stri(gm)Sacca) (A4)
